text:
I haven't pressure tested this at all, but I made a data mapping script a while back that maps a data object to form fields, designed to work with HS forms, firing a change event on every field that's trying to map data.

Takes 2 arguments: a data object and a mapping object - <https://gist.github.com/robertainslie/b197e832879b29bf54883a776470bd00>
